import React from 'react'; import CreateACharacter from './CreateACharacter'; import ShowUserCharacters from './ShowCharacters/ShowUserCharacters'; import { Container, Row } from 'react-bootstrap'; function CharacterViews(props){ const { currentUser } = props; return(
{ props.currentUser.characters.length > 0 ?

< ShowUserCharacters currentUser={ props.currentUser } className='span3 offset2' />

) } export default CharacterViews;
